headline: LandBridge Announces Strategic Agreement with NRG to Power Potential Data Center in the Delaware Basin, Texas
summary: HOUSTON, September 23, 2025--LandBridge Company LLC (NYSE: LB) ("LandBridge") announced that it has entered into a strategic agreement with NRG Energy, Inc. ("NRG") with respect to a potential data center site in Reeves County, Texas, in the Delaware Basin.
